description: Micron Biomedical, Inc. | 624 followers on LinkedIn. Micron Biomedical, Inc. is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company on a rapid path to bring to market drugs and vaccines that are formulated into a proprietary patch technology that simplifies and improves the way actives are delivered, stored, and distributed. This technology is designed to increase patient access to drugs and vaccines that would otherwise require expert injection and to improve safety and efficacy by skin targeting.
